title: Font
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: Font
type: datatype
summary: |
  Describes the font used to render text.
description: |
  Describes the font used to render text. Every font consists of a font
  family, a weight like Enum.FontWeight.Bold, and a style like
  Enum.FontStyle.Italic.

  Font families are a type of asset, like images or meshes. Each font family
  contains a number of font faces, and each face has a different weight and
  style.

  Datatype.Font is used by the Class.TextLabel.FontFace,
  Class.TextButton.FontFace, Class.TextBox.FontFace, and similar properties.
  See also Enum.Font as an older alternative to this datatype that is required
  by some methods and properties.




    Name
    Asset ID / Weights / Appearance




    Accanthis ADF Std
    rbxasset://fonts/families/AccanthisADFStd.json


    Amatic SC
    rbxasset://fonts/families/AmaticSC.json


    Arimo
    rbxasset://fonts/families/Arimo.json

constructors:
  - name: Font.new
    summary: Creates a new Datatype.Font.
    description: Creates a new Datatype.Font.
    parameters:
      - name: family
        type: Content
        default:
        summary: |-
          The asset ID for the font family, starting with rbxasset:// or
          rbxassetid://.
      - name: weight
        type: FontWeight
        default: Enum.FontWeight.Regular
        summary: How thick the text is.
      - name: style
        type: FontStyle
        default: Enum.FontStyle.Normal
        summary: Whether the text is normal or italic.
    codesamples:
      - datatype-Font-new
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Font.fromEnum
    summary: Creates a Datatype.Font from an Enum.Font value.
    description: |-
      Creates a Datatype.Font from an Enum.Font value. Throws an error when called with Enum.Font.Unknown.

      The following table indicates how each Enum.Font value maps to a font Datatype.Font.Family|Family.




        Font Enums
        Equivalent Family




        Enum.Font.AmaticSC|AmaticSC
        rbxasset://fonts/families/AmaticSC.json


        Enum.Font.Antique|Antique
        rbxasset://fonts/families/RomanAntique.json


        Enum.Font.Arcade|Arcade
        rbxasset://fonts/families/PressStart2P.json


        Enum.Font.Arimo|Arimo, Enum.Font.ArimoBold|ArimoBold

        Enum.Font.Bodoni|Bodoni

        rbxasset://fonts/families/BuilderSans.json

        rbxasset://fonts/families/ComicNeueAngular.json


        Enum.Font.Code|Code
        rbxasset://fonts/families/Inconsolata.json

        Enum.Font.FredokaOne|FredokaOne
        rbxasset://fonts/families/FredokaOne.json


        Enum.Font.Garamond|Garamond
        rbxasset://fonts/families/Guru.json


        Enum.Font.GrenzeGotisch|GrenzeGotisch
        rbxasset://fonts/families/GrenzeGotisch.json

        rbxasset://fonts/families/HighwayGothic.json

        rbxasset://fonts/families/IndieFlower.json


        Enum.Font.JosefinSans|JosefinSans
        rbxasset://fonts/families/JosefinSans.json


        Enum.Font.Jura|Jura
        rbxasset://fonts/families/Jura.json


        Enum.Font.Kalam|Kalam
        rbxasset://fonts/families/Kalam.json


        Enum.Font.Legacy|Legacy

        rbxasset://fonts/families/Merriweather.json

        rbxasset://fonts/families/SourceSansPro.json

    parameters:
      - name: font
        type: Font
        default:
        summary: The enum value of the font to use.
    codesamples:
      - datatype-Font-fromEnum
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Font.fromName
    summary: Creates a Datatype.Font from a name like FredokaOne.
    description: |-
      This is a convenience method for creating fonts from the content folder. The name you pass in will be converted into an asset ID like rbxasset://fonts/families/BuilderSans.json.

      The name can only contain alphabetical characters, digits,  (underscore), and - (hyphen). It can't contain any spaces.
    parameters:
      - name: name
        type: string
        default:
        summary: The name of the font.
      - name: weight
        type: FontWeight
        default: Enum.FontWeight.Regular
        summary: How thick the text is.
      - name: style
        type: FontStyle
        default: Enum.FontStyle.Normal
        summary: Whether the text is normal or italic.
    codesamples:
      - datatype-Font-fromName
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Font.fromId
    summary: Creates a Datatype.Font from a numerical asset ID.
    description: This is a convenience method for creating fonts from an asset ID number.
    parameters:
      - name: id
        type: number
        default:
        summary: The asset ID of the font as a number.
      - name: weight
        type: FontWeight
        default: Enum.FontWeight.Regular
        summary: How thick the text is.
      - name: style
        type: FontStyle
        default: Enum.FontStyle.Normal
        summary: Whether the text is normal or italic.
    codesamples:
      - datatype-Font-fromId
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
constants: []
properties:
  - name: Font.Family
    type: Content
    summary: |
      The asset ID for the font family.
    description: |
      The asset ID for the font family. These start with either rbxasset:// or
      rbxassetid://.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Font.Weight
    type: FontWeight
    summary: |
      How thick the text is.
    description: |
      How thick the text is. The default value is Enum.FontWeight.Regular.

      When set, Datatype.Font.Bold is updated and becomes true if the weight
      is Enum.FontWeight.SemiBold or thicker.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Font.Style
    type: FontStyle
    summary: |
      Whether the font is italic.
    description: |
      Whether the font is italic. The default value is Enum.FontStyle.Normal.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Font.Bold
    type: bool
    summary: |
      Whether the font is bold.
    description: |
      Whether the font is bold. Sets Datatype.Font.Weight to
      Enum.FontWeight.Bold when true, or to Enum.FontWeight.Regular
      otherwise.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
methods: []
functions: []
